posts.post_content:
Hey Guys,

I have a Devore double factory up for sale.  I'm not sure what these tend to go for, so I'll take offers.  I do know that it took me quite awhile to find my first when I started looking.

Asking $50 obo
Paypal or MO.

Email me at [url]lukealyon@gmail.com[/url] with questions or for higher resolution scans.  

Thanks for looking!
